DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study confirm previous observation asthmatic chronic nadolol treatment reduces asthmatic airway hyper-responsiveness .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Nadolol Treatment Adults With Mild Asthma
DOC.criteria: Prebronchodilator FEV1 80 % great predict value . PC20 FEV1 ≤4 mg/ml methacholine challenge test . Blood Pressure ≥ 100/65mm Hg . Pulse rate ≥ 60 beats/min . No significant health issue . Nonsmoker Xsmoker < 10 pack/year . History upper/lower respiratory tract infection asthma exacerbation within 6 week first baseline visit . Currently diagnose chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) . Used oral inhaled corticosteroid within 4 week first baseline visit .
